name: Egg tree
objective:
Put the %%icon icon-egg$%% egg of maximum value into the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron.

%%icon mdi mdi-alert-octagon-outline$%%Maximum number of heroes: 31
loss_reason_wrong_egg_in_cauldron: A hero put an %%icon icon-egg$%% egg which is not of maximum value in the cauldron
loss_reason_too_mush_heroes:
The maximum number of heroes has been exceeded.
Maximum number of heroes: 31
